subsection.name: What is Hippo Content EXIM (Export / Import)?
subsection.p: This project is going to provide a higher level feature of Content Import and Export, depending on Hippo JCR POJO Binding library (which provides a lower level JCR mapping/binding mechanism only).

So, for example, while Hippo JCR POJO Binding library doesn't provide any Hippo Repository Workflow level operations properly, this project is going to provide that kind of higher level, that is, Hippo Repository Workflow level, Content Import / Export features.
